articles.content: Umar Akmal's troubled cricket career has hit its biggest roadblock yet, with the PCB handing him a ban from all representative cricket for three years after he pleaded guilty of failing to report det… [+1506 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]

articles.author: Alex Mitchley, Sheldon Morais and Na'ilah Ebrahim
articles.title: Taxi strike: Transport minister blasts impoundments, metro hits back at 'misinformation' briefing
articles.description: With tensions still running high over a taxi strike in the Western Cape, Transport Minister Sindiswe Chikunga and the City of Cape Town are at odds over whether the metro was acting lawfully in impounding taxis.
articles.content:
• Cape Town has been gripped by a taxi strike which emanated from the impounding of taxis for traffic infringements.

articles.author: La Repubblica
articles.title: Il ritorno di Marta Fascina dopo un’assenza di quattro mesi: allo stadio di Monza per il trofeo Berlusconi
articles.description: La deputata che è stata a fianco dell’ex presidente del Consiglio fino alla sua morte ha scelto un appuntamento sportivo per farsi rivedere in pubblico
articles.content: Rieccola, Marta Fascina. Ha scelto lo stadio per farsi rivedere in pubblico, quasi due mesi dopo lultima apparizione ai funerali di Silvio Berlusconi. La deputata che è stata al fianco dellex preside… [+181 chars]
